description:
The Vox Pupuli collective group has announced the first release of OpenVox, a community-maintained open source implementation of the Puppet configuration management system.

Introduced January 21, the OpenVox automation framework is designed to be a drop-in replacement for Puppet, but currently comes with a caveat: “Be aware, of course, that even though you can type the same commands, use all the same modules and extensions, and configure the same settings, OpenVox is not yet tested to the same standard that Puppet i
title: Puppet open source fork OpenVox arrives
